item.title: Homelab
item.description: bash <(curl -s https://gitlab.com/NickBusey/HomelabOS/-/raw/master/install_homelabos.sh) ========== Preparing HomelabOS docker image ========== ========== This account is NOT in the docker group ========== Do you want to add yourself to the docker group?

item.title: Mosquitto
item.description: ==> mosquitto mosquitto has been installed with a default configuration file. You can make changes to the configuration by editing: /opt/homebrew/etc/mosquitto/mosquitto.
